裯字的基本解释

裯
chóu
被单，一说为床帐：“抱衾与裯”。

裯
dāo
短衣。

裯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chóu］
［《廣韻》直由切，平尤，澄。］
［《廣韻》直誅切，平虞，澄。］
单被。亦泛指衾被；一说为床帐。
[②]［dāo］
［《廣韻》都牢切，平豪，端。］
(1)袛裯，贴身短衣。
(2)指破旧衣。

裯字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1118第29
【唐韻】直由切【韻會】陳留切【正韻】徐留切，?音儔。【類篇】被也。【詩·召南】抱衾與裯。【傳】襌被也。【箋】牀帳也。【韻會】漢名帳爲裯，因以爲牀帳也。　又【集韻】都勞切，音刀。衣袂。【揚子·方言】汗襦，自關而西謂之袛裯。【郭註】亦呼爲掩汀也。【後漢·羊續傳】唯有布衾敝袛裯。　又【廣韻】直誅切，音㕑。襌衣也。【韻會】與㡡通。

裯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
裯字的起名意思

暂无。

coverlet
Basic explanation of words
coverlet
chóu
The sheet is said to be a bed net: "Holding the quilt and the bed".
coverlet
dāo
Short coat.
coverlet
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chóu］
["Guang Yun" straight from the cut, Ping You, Cheng. ]
["Guangyun" straight cut, Pingyu, Cheng. ]
Single quilt. It also refers to the quilt in general; one said it is a bed net.
[②]［dāo］
["Guangyun" is firm, Pinghao, Duan. ]
(1) Mohua, close-fitting short clothes.
(2) Refers to worn-out clothes.
coverlet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　裯; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1118 29
[Tang Yun] Zhiyuqie [Rhyme Hui] Chen Liuqie [Zheng Yun] Xu Liuqie, "Yin Jian." 【Classes】Be also. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Hold the quilt and tuck. [Biography] The quilt is also. [Jan] The bed net also. [Rhyme Club] The Chinese name tent is 裯, because I think it is also a bed tent.　[Jiyun] All hard work, sound knife. Robes. 【Yangtze Dialect】Khan Yu, which is called moraine from Guan to the west. [Guo's Note] It is also called a cover up. [Later Han·Sheep Continued Biography] Only cloth 衾敝裯.　[Guangyun] Straight cut, sound 㕑. Yiyi also. [Rhyme Club] Connect with 㡡.
